item.title: CVE-2024-34569|2024-08-02T02:59:20.966Z -- katie%20seaborn -- zotpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Katie Seaborn Zotpress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Zotpress: from n/a through 7.3.9.
